PaymentTerms: PLEASE STAND ADVISED, that if the Balance Due (AMOUNT OFF INVOICE) should remain unpaid for 60 days or more, the Balance Due will be increased to include a 10% penalty, and interest at 7%, allowed under Labor Code, section 4622(b). Additionally, the Balance Due will also be increased to include an additional 25% penalty, allowed under the new California Code of Regulations, Title 8, Section 9981(e), which became operative as of July 15, 2022. 4622(b)
